title: These micro-disconnects are getting beyond ridiculous
body:
At first I thought it was a DDoS or something, and then I realised why the hell would someone DDoS in Gold. And then it started occuring more frequently, these moments where I can't move for a few seconds, followed by "attempting to reconnect" flashing, and then movement returns a couple of seconds later. It typically happens when a team fight is about to occur or there are a number of champions in close proximity.

ISP is Internode, been happening 1 in 3 games the past week

replies.body: Have you scanned your computer for malicious softwares? Have you tried turning off your firewall/anti-virus while playing? Have you made sure all other applications are closed while playing?
